sentence: Israel's  latest  military  operation  in  Gaza  began  in  response  to  the  October  7  attack  that  killed  roughly  1,200  people,  according  to  the  Israeli  government.
More  than  18,000  Palestinians  have  died  so  far,  the  majority  of  whom  are  women  and  children,  according  to  the  Gaza  health  ministry.
